text: Agustí Sans Valls (born February 27, 1995) is a Spanish professional basketball player for Força Lleida of the LEB Oro. ==Career== ===Joventut=== Played for Sant Lluís, La Salle Mahón, Islas Baleares and Alcázar at Balearic Islands before enter the Club Joventut Badalona on 2009. Nike International Junior Tournament champion on 2013, scoring 14 points and handing out 6 assists in the final game against FC Barcelona. Being a farm team member, made his professional debut on 20 October 2013, playing 13 minutes for Joventut on a Liga ACB game against FC Barcelona. He played four more games between 2013–14 and 2015–16 seasons. On September 2016 terminated his contract, after four seasons playing for the farm team on LEB Oro and LEB Plata. ===Força Lleida=== On 31 October 2016, signed for LEB Oro side Força Lleida. He leaves the team after 9 games. ===Oviedo=== On 15 December 2016, signed for also LEB Oro side Oviedo CB. He played the rest of 2016–17 season becoming Copa Princesa de Asturias champion. ===Huesca=== On 25 September 2017, after joining Bilbao Basket for the preseason, signed for LEB Oro side CB Peñas Huesca. He spent two seasons at Huesca. ===Força Lleida=== On 8 July 2019, returns to LEB Oro side Força Lleida. ==National team== Sans played for the Spanish men's national team on the 2010 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship winning bronze medal on the 2011 tournament. Member of the national team on the 2012 FIBA Under-17 World Championship. Bronze medal on the 2013 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship and silver on the 2014 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship. ==References== ==External links== *ACB profile *FEB profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish men's basketball players Category:Liga ACB players Category:Joventut Badalona players Category:CB Prat players Category:Força Lleida CE players Category:Oviedo CB players Category:CB Peñas Huesca players Category:Point guards
title: Agustí Sans
